entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
